snippet: Omar Gonzalez was the most valuable player but David Beckham and Landon Donovan provided the story lines Saturday night as the Los Angeles Galaxy beat the Houston Dynamo, 3-1, to win their second straight M.L.S. championship.
abstract: Omar Gonzalez was the most valuable player but David Beckham and Landon Donovan provided the story lines Saturday night as the Los Angeles Galaxy beat the Houston Dynamo, 3-1, to win their second straight M.L.S. championship.

headline.main: Beckham Goes Out a Winner. Will Donovan Follow?
